result.title: Intra-college Programming Contest Series
result.content:
Hi all,
The Programming Club will be conducting a series of programming contests, regularly. The contests will be of varying difficulty, for different target audience. The main purpose is to get everyone to do contests at the college level, and so that we can host sessions/discussions for various topics/problems.

The first contest will be held on Sunday, 10/09/2017, from 20:30 to 23:30. It will be a three hour round, and will have around 5-6 problems. The primary target contestants are UG2/UG3/PG1/PG2 who have a good knowledge of programming basics, and basics of algorithms, and wish to test their skills. We will also discuss the problems once the contest is over.

To participate:

  • Joining the group:

    • Request to join this group, as a participant.
    • Only profiles which mention IIIT Hyderabad as the institution will be accepted. (Please ensure that you pick the correct IIIT Hyderabad, there are multiple entries)

  • Registering for the contest:

    • The registration will begin 6 hours before the contest starts.
    • Go to the contests tab (next to the blog tab), and click on register
    • You HAVE to register for the contest, if you wish to participate.

The first contest is being hosted by Aakash (FundamentalEq). Hoping to see an enthusiastic participation!

If you have any queries, please ask below.
